app_desc: Elevate your lifestyle with our concierge, offering personalized services and extraordinary experiences.
under_dev_desc: We're still working on this feature. Please check back later.
loading_desc: Hang on a sec...we are setting up your personalized experience
phone_auth_error_desc: We are unable to verify your phone number. Please try again later.

sign_out_desc: Are you sure you want to sign out?
